Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Authorizes daily visitation at all general confinement correctional facilities
Summary: Authorizes visitation at all general confinement correctional facilities seven days a week.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing daily visitation at general confinement correctional facilities
